title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: Lea\-ing this, on the opposite side of the river, a fine view is obtained of Kirktonhill House (George Taylor, Esq.), and on the left are Craigo, Gallrey, and Baimakewan.

title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: Skirting the slopes of the valley of the North Esk, on the right, are the extensive manufacturing works of Logie and Craigo, and Craigo Station (53J miles).
